comment: Literally the easiest class I've taken. She knows most students are only in the course because it's required so attendance was not mandatory. She gives a study guide and tells all the answers to it the class day before the test. The study  guide is the test exactly. I only went the day before the test and test days and made a high A!

Great teacher. Attendance is MANDATORY. I did not know this and I lowered my grade a full letter; my fault though as it says it in the syllabus. Great professor- I would take her again no doubt. She is very unbiased too. Though I know she loves Lincoln, I don't know if she is Republican or Democrat. Awesome professor. Really enjoyed her class.

If you want an A, take her. She makes class easy, VERY clear, and worth taking. You will learn things in her class but she makes the discussions interesting and funny. As long as you complete your study guides you are good for your tests. Can't stress this enough, she is awesome take her you will not regret it!!!

What a great professor and great class!!! As a Com student I never knew I would learn so much about political parties! Not only that she accommodated me and made a way for me to use what I have learned in Com studies to guide my new learning of political parties. TAKE HER!

Professor Merrell is a fantastic professor. The student who complained about create a party is very incorrect. The project taught me more about how political parties operate then learning their history (which I've seen before in other classes). Professor Merrell is very helpful and nice and I would recommend her to anyone.

This teacher is absolutely amazing.Her number 1 goal is the success of her students. She tried an experimental Create-a-Party assignment that was unlike anything I had ever experienced. It started rough, but got much better as the semester went on. Complaining about that, or anything else she's done, would be unimaginable.
omg! I love this class. She basically gives you an a. You also learn a lot the government that you never knew. I am glad I took her. You should too :)

DO NOT TAKE HER! She introduced this new Create a Party thing that was utterly useless. Instead of learning about political parties, we spent most of the time pretending to be in one and holding elections. Pointless and complete waste of time. Teach me something instead of playing make-believe. I SIGNED  UP FOR COLLEGE, NOT DAY-CARE. Avoid!!!

She is AMAZING!! No joke I came into the class scared and she turned my view around! The test are EXACTLY like the study guide! yes she gives study guides. All the notes are online. take her if you want an A!

If you can , PLEASE take her. She is amazing. I have never had a teacher so easy. Everything on the study guide is EXACTLY whats on the test. Although attendance isn't mandatory, going to her class is fun. She's super sarcastic & makes jokes in class all the time. She's the best, hands down .
TAKE HER! She is such an easy teacher! Makes it impossible to get any grade less than an A in her class. Take her and you wont regret it.

Take this professor. You will be a repeat in her class after taking her your first time. She is great. Her classes are laid back. She facilitates open discussion in current events. She really cares for her students.

This woman is FREAKING brilliant! Once, as I was getting ready for school, my mother asked me why I was glowing.  The answer? Because I was going to be illumined by Professor Merrell's infinite wisdom!!!  Take her, and the benefits will redound to your children, and their children's children!!!

Best POLS professor ever! She pretty much hands out A as long as you study the study guides and pay attention to her notes that are also online. She will go over the study guide the day before exams and the exam is EXACTLY the same stuff on the guide.Definately take her if you can!

She is the best!!! Very good teacher, provides notes in advance, provides study guides, does review before test, she wants the best for her students, very easy going, fun class, just read, discuss current events, 3 tests, one paper on president of your choice, not a hard grader, gives some opportunity for extra credit, good for recommendations
